summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EKA-AI monorepo Flask backend with React frontend. Backend API endpoints functional, static file serving working, frontend-backend integration successful.

api_quota_issues.issue: Gemini API quota exceeded - free tier limits reached
api_quota_issues.impact: AI chat responses return fallback error message
api_quota_issues.details: 429 RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED error from Gemini API due to quota limits

model_compatibility_issues.issue: Gemini model doesn't support audio response modalities
model_compatibility_issues.details: Model gemini-2.0-flash doesn't support audio generation

passed_tests: Static root file serving (/) - serves index.html correctly
Static asset serving (/assets/*) - JavaScript bundles load
Chat API endpoint structure - accepts POST requests and returns proper JSON
Chat API error handling - validates input data
API route protection - returns 404 for non-existent routes
Frontend UI loading - React app renders correctly
Frontend navigation - tabs are clickable and functional
Frontend-backend integration - chat messages sent successfully
Frontend responsive design - professional dark theme UI

success_percentage.backend: 89% (8/9 core tests passed, 1 API quota issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Consider upgrading Gemini API plan to resolve quota limits, or implement fallback AI service. Update speak API to use compatible model for audio generation.
